name: kids-schedule-website
description: Interactive daily schedule for kids with AI suggestions

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir dist/src --copy-files && babel config --out-dir dist/config --copy-files && cp index.html dist/
scripts.build:dev: NODE_ENV=development babel src --out-dir dist/src --copy-files --source-maps && babel config --out-dir dist/config --copy-files --source-maps && cp index.html dist/
scripts.build:watch: npm run build:dev && concurrently "babel src config --out-dir dist --copy-files --source-maps --watch" "http-server dist -p 8000 -c-1 --cors"

author: Prasanth Kumar Allam <kumarprasanth119@gmail.com>
